attributes.action: Call a General Election at the earliest possible time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The electorate have had no opportunity to vote on the actions the Government have taken recently.  Our hard earned taxpayers money has been thrown at the banks with no reference to us.  Worse still, we have a currently unelected Prime Minister who has no mandate to spend our money in this way.  We demand the opportunity to have a general election as soon as it can physically be arranged.  This is the only way that the British electorate can either choose to support the current Government or to remove them from power.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
